author: karamel
long_description: Timed World Modifiers pick some random nodes from time to time and check if a TWM was registered for that kind of node and execute it if the chance test passes. Node at the surface or ceiling are a bit more likely to be selected than deep ones. TWM aims to avoid registering a dozen of ABM that could trigger on a wide range of nodes (for example ground nodes) for non-critical effects. It picks a node, assuming it is likely to have a TWM assigned to it. This mod doesn't add anything by itself. Check out other mods using the library for effective changes. Links: * [API documentation](https://files.creativekara.fr/minetest/twmlib/twmlib_api.txt) (included in the mod) * [All versions](https://files.creativekara.fr/minetest/twmlib/) * Clone the repository: git clone https://files.creativekara.fr/git/twmlib.git
name: twmlib
short_description: Environmental ABM that could be triggered on a very wide range of nodes but only a few at a time.
title: Timed World Modifiers library
